Html:
Hi

I find that like a number of developers i can more easily learn a language or framework by example.

Are there any samples for illustrating specific points and areas of WPF (2010)?

For example areas could include:

  • Simple XAML
  • Databinding / element binding
  • Dependency properties
  • Routed events
  • etc

Thanks

Les

Have you tried these code samples ?

http://windowsclient.net/downloads/folders/wpfsamples/default.aspx

There are a number of videos too on WPF which might help you
http://windowsclient.net/learn/
